Alfuzosin.description: Alfuzosin comes as an extended-release (long-acting) tablet to take by mouth. It is usually taken once a day, immediately after a meal. Do not take alfuzosin on an empty stomach.

Doxazosin.description: Doxazosin can treat urinary problems caused by an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia). It can also treat high blood pressure when used alone or in combination with other medications.

Silodosin.description: Silodosin can treat problems caused by an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia or BPH).

Tamsulosin.description: Tamsulosin can treat an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia).

Terazosin.description: Terazosin can treat high blood pressure and enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia).
